name: Asoka
overview:
Founded in 2001, Asoka is a leading developer of simple, secure, and reliable powerline networking products that use existing electrical wires to deliver high-speed networking throughout a home or business. Designed for both residential and commercial environments, Asoka’s innovative products are sold globally through carriers and systems integrators. The company offers the broadest and most complete portfolio of powerline products available today, and boasts powerline technology leadership and knowledge unparalleled in the industry. In addition to being 100% focused on powerline networking (PLN) solutions, Asoka established the baseline platform that helped thrust PLN solutions into the market, and pioneered a remotely manageable PLN solution optimized for deployment by carriers and systems integrators.

The company offers HomePlugÂ®-certified product lines for both residential and commercial applications including high-speed Internet access, data, VoIP, standard and high definition (SD and HD) TV, IPTV, security, monitoring, and surveillance services. Its PlugLinkÂ® family of residential products is designed to provide simple, secure, reliable home networking and includes Ethernet and wireless routers and adapters, unique Ethernet adapters integrated into power strips, and a remotely accessible IP camera.

The PlugLANâ„¢ commercial product line delivers Internet to every room, every outlet, and every person in MDU/MTUs, hospitality, and small businesses with enterprise-class management, security, and scalability. The PlugLAN line includes a full-featured switching gateway, Ethernet and wireless adapters, and an innovative Ethernet adapter with integrated pass-through electrical outlets.

funding_rounds.source_description: Asoka USA raises $7M for to turn electrical outlets into broadband connections
